sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import './add.css' const Add = () => { const [incresecount,setincresecount]=useState(0) const location=useLocation() const passeddata=location.state function increse(){ setincresecount(incresecount+1) } function decrese(){ if(incresecount>0){ setincresecount(incresecount-1) } return } return (

TITLE:{passeddata.title}

{passeddata.discription}

Price: {passeddata.price}

) } export default Add
